name: Project Zero 2: Crimson Butterfly
summary: Terror returns with Project Zero 2: Crimson Butterfly, the sequel to the highly popular survival horror title, Project Zero. This time the terrifying journey takes you to a whole new creepy setting, an abandoned village, where you play the role of Mio Amakura, a young girl who is gifted with a strong sixth sense and her twin sister Mayu, who notices a crimson butterfly faintly glowing in the sky. Your only weapon, an antique camera, has received a variety of new features to kill ghosts. Get lost in another horrifying tale.
